rsvp.message: Hi Babitta, thank you so much for the invitation! I'm excited to celebrate with you and will be joining the wedding. Wishing you both lots of happiness! üíê

messages.invitation: WE INVITE YOU TO CELEBRATE OUR WEDDING
messages.familyMessage: With the blessings of Lord Ganesha, we joyfully invite you to bless and celebrate the wedding of our beloved Babitta with Tushar. Your presence will make our happiness complete.

toast.title: Thanks for Visiting Our Website!
toast.content: We're so happy you're here and can't thank you enough for all the love and support since our roka. We're truly grateful and can't wait to celebrate with you on our big day! üíï
